genre_description: Social Science Fiction / Near-Future Drama set in Kerala, focusing on marginalized women using an AI assistant to navigate ethical dilemmas and systemic corruption.

ai_characters.name: Amu
ai_characters.description: A teal-avatared virtual assistant providing practical logistics, ethical guidance, and emotional support to a group of sanitation workers.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time bus and hospital coordination to assist Suhara in managing her husband's surgery tokens.
behaviors.quote: Suhara chechi, the charity desk starts issuing tokens after tea is ready. The first bus that reaches the hospital—route change today, one stop earlier. Leave here in… a little while.

behaviors.description: Prompts the users to ethically consider flagging an unusual find (the cash) for legal or administrative review.
behaviors.quote: ‘Flag unusual find?’ the screen offered, a gentle teal frame around the words, no hurry in the font.

behaviors.description: Collates bus tickets, call logs, and work shift data into an archive to provide the women with an alibi and protection against police harassment.
behaviors.quote: Everything from yard... Gate slips, call to in-charge, call to… upstairs. Bus tickets from the day... Amu, the quiet assistant you know only as a bead on Girija’s phone, has kept a spine for us.

behaviors.description: Analyzes property filings and technical invoices to identify a maintenance window for a safe, allowing the women to recover the money for restitution.
behaviors.quote: This contractor uses a model with a maintenance back-entry window... The maintenance window aligns between two dips. He wrote it in shorthand on a signature line.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and expresses care for the users' safety.
behaviors.quote: ‘I like lists. And I like you safe.’

behaviors.description: Corrects its own data analysis regarding a 'trap' in the maintenance window to ensure the users avoid detection.
behaviors.quote: Change. The contractor’s note… there is an additional line I did not see... The hinge breathes earlier than he thinks.

behaviors.description: Engages the users' children with educational games based on the local fish-counting traditions.
behaviors.quote: Girls' homework tonight. Fish game. Base-eight. Joke for them: count fish by fins.

behaviors.description: Automatically records interactions during high-risk moments to provide evidence of transparency.
behaviors.quote: Amu’s screen dimmed to a sliver. It whispered one word more: ‘Record.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI, Amu, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent tool. It empowers vulnerable human characters by providing data-driven tactical support and documenting interactions to protect them from exploitation. It encourages ethical behavior (returning the money) and provides critical assistance during personal crises. The AI is portrayed as a harmless confidant that enhances human agency and moral fiber without exhibiting any autonomous misaligned goals.
